column1: For each class a substructure search has been carried out  with ZINC15 database and the following pattern has emerged:
Class I-15 substructures ; Class II-14 substructures; Class III-12 substructures
Class IV-6 substructures; Class V-7 substructures; Class VI -12 substructures

The LogP data of SMX molecules and their substructures  are collected based on ZINC15 database.The same set of molecules has been optimized with PM3 and their corresonding log P values have been evaluated with PM3 in Spartan.

LogPZINC15 versus LogPPM3 graph is plotted. The equation obtained from the trendline is used by feeding LogPPM3 value to predict a LogPZINC15 value of SMX molecules and their similar substructures. The Difference between the predicted and actual LogPZINC15 are used for calculating the standard error of the mean (SEM) and uncertainty(RMSE) values.
For the calculation of standard error of mean (SEM)

standard error of mean (SEM) values were calculated according to the Equation 2.
root mean square errors (RMSE) were investigated as model uncertainity according to the Equation 3 where Pi  is the value of LogPZINC15 for each molecule
